creator: thorn@tiscali.no
text:
php_value include_path ... in virtual host .htaccess changes the global include 
path on occation. This causes the other virtual hosts to fail to lookup their 
own code. 
The error is not reproducable reliably, but it may seem to occur when accessing 
non-.htaccess virtual hosts after someone have accessed .htaccess protected 
virtual hosts. 
I never noticed this problem before upgrading to Apache 2.0.47 from 2.0 44.

This one looks like a PHP problem. That you didn't notice the problem earlier,
doesn't mean that it didn't exist ;-). Please address the issue to the php bug
database (<bugs.php.net>) and see if it can be solved there.

Thanks for using Apache.
creator: nd@perlig.de
